thread.title: GSB Software H1 revenue stable at EUR 6.1 mln
thread.title_full: BRIEF-GSB Software H1 revenue stable at EUR 6.1 mln | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: GSB Software H1 revenue stable at EUR 6.1 mln
text:
Sept 25 GBS Software AG :
* Said on Thursday H1 revenue 6.1 million euros ($6.80 million), same figure as in the previous year's period
* H1 EBITDA 1.0 million euros vs 0.7 million euros year ago
* H1 net loss 0.2 million euros vs net loss 0.7 million euros year ago
* Confirms earnings forecast for FY 2015
Source text: bit.ly/1NQbXkV
($1 = 0.8965 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
